subject: NCAA Ice Hockey Championships
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Max Novak and Matt Hatch each scored two goals to lead Union to a 5-2 win over Vermont in its opening game of the N.C.A.A. tournament in Bridgeport, Conn.
snippet: Max Novak and Matt Hatch each scored two goals to lead Union to a 5-2 win over Vermont in its opening game of the N.C.A.A. tournament in Bridgeport, Conn.
